title: Star Wars Episode IV - Silver Screen Reencode
description:
StarWarsEpIV-1977-SilverScreenReencode-1080p-x264-AAC2.0
Made February 2016
x.264 encoding, MP4 container
1920x1080, 16:9 aspect
2.0 AAC audio

This is a re-encode of the Team Negative "Silver Screen" edition of Star Wars Episode IV. The original file weighs in at a hefty 22GB and was encoded at 25,500 Kbps. This was re-encoded down to a more manageble 3.4GB and 3691 Kbps. No editing was performed.

The command line used for encoding was:

ffmpeg -i input.mkv -c:v libx264 -crf 25 -threads 6 -strict -2 out.mp4



ffmpeg version 2.2.4

The original Team Negative notes are included.

PLEASE SEED!
